report.title: Locations available for group.
report.description: Returns the list of sites that are available for a user to link to a recording group.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN groups_locations gl on gl.location_id=l.id and gl.deleted=false AND gl.group_id=#group_id# LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=l.location_type_id #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND gl.id IS NULL -- site is not currently linked to the group AND l.created_by_id=#user_id# AND #website_filter#

param.name: group_id
param.description: The group to show available locations for

param.name: user_id
param.description: The user adding the location. Limits the results to locations created by this user

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of location_type_ids to allow for inclusion in the results.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
